welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Gautier, where southern hospitality meets picturesque views. Known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jackson County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gulfport-Biloxi International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal is used for regional flights and is connected to the main terminal via a shuttle bus.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mobile Regional Airport houses all major airlines and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Mobile Regional Airport primarily serves regional and charter airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
